00011 #include <boost/intrusive_ptr.hpp>
00012 #include <boost/detail/atomic_count.hpp>

00014 #include "ThreadModel.h"

00016 NS_IZENELIB_UTIL_BEGIN

00019 template<class LockType> struct RefCount {
00020         int refCount;
00021         RefCount() :
00022                 refCount(0) {
00023         }
00024         void refer() {
00025                 ++refCount;
00026         }
00027         void unrefer() {
00028                 if (--refCount == 0)
00029                         delete this;
00030         }
00031         virtual ~RefCount() {
00032         }
00033 };
00034 
00035 template<> struct RefCount<ReadWriteLock> {
00036         boost::detail::atomic_count refCount;
00037         //int refCount;
00038         RefCount() :
00039                 refCount(0) {
00040         }
00041         void refer() {
00042                 ++refCount;
00043         }
00044         void unrefer() {
00045                 if (--refCount == 0)
00046                         delete this;
00047         }
00048         virtual ~RefCount() {
00049         }
00050 };
00051 
00052 inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(RefCount<NullLock> * p) {
00053         if(p)p->refer();
00054 }
00055 inline void intrusive_ptr_release(RefCount<NullLock> * p) {
00056         if(p)p->unrefer();
00057 }
00058 inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(RefCount<ReadWriteLock> * p) {
00059         if(p)p->refer();
00060 }
00061 inline void intrusive_ptr_release(RefCount<ReadWriteLock> * p) {
00062         if(p)p->unrefer();
00063 }
